import React, { Component } from 'react' import Modal from 'react-modal'; import axios from 'axios' const customStyles = { content: { top: '50%', left: '50%', right: 'auto', bottom: 'auto', marginRight: '-50%', transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)', }, }; class Header extends Component { constructor(){ super(); this.state={ backgroundcolor:'', display:'none', loginModalIsOPen:false, username: undefined, isLoggedin:false, imageUrl:undefined, loading:false, signupModalOpen:false, signinModalOpen:false, email:undefined, password:undefined, confirmpassword:undefined, signupError:"", } } handle handelLogin =()=>{ this.setState({loginModalIsOPen:true }); } handelcancel=()=>{ this.setState({loginModalIsOPen:false }) } render() { const {loginModalIsOPen}=this.state; return (
e!

) } } export default Header
